metadata.Description: The Sustainable Development Goals are a global call to action to end poverty, protect the planet, and ensure that all people enjoy peace and prosperity by 2030.

Sustainable Development Goals.Description: The SDGs aim to end poverty in all its forms everywhere, focusing on the most vulnerable, including children and the elderly.
The SDGs promote access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all, enhancing global energy security and environmental sustainability.
The SDGs advocate for urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts through international agreements and local initiatives.
The SDGs support quality education to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
The SDGs focus on ensuring healthy lives and promoting well-being for all at all ages, which includes efforts to reduce mortality and combat diseases.
The SDGs rely on revitalized global partnerships for sustainable development, including partnerships with governments, the private sector, and civil society.
The SDGs aim to improve global economic growth by promoting inclusive and sustainable economic activities, employment, and decent work for all.
